title: Digital Asset Management
description: Digital Asset Management is a full-stack web application for storing, organizing, and accessing digital files. Users can upload documents, videos, and images securely to the cloud (Cloudinary), preview them online, search by file name, and sort files by type or date. Built with a modern tech stack and designed for seamless user experience, it simplifies asset management for individuals and teams.

title: MysteryMessage
description: MysteryMessage is an anonymous messaging platform where users can receive messages without revealing the sender's identity. Featuring secure authentication with NextAuth (credentials and OTP verification), users can log in, view, and delete messages stored in MongoDB. The app is designed with modern UI components, seamless UX, and email delivery via Nodemailer and Resend.
